submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        n=len(nums)
        M=10**9+7
        MAX=max(nums)+1
        dp=[[0]*MAX for _ in range(MAX)]
        for i in range(nums[0]+1):
            c1=i
            c2=nums[0]-i
            dp[c1][c2]=1
            
        # print(dp)  
        for i in range(1,n):
            dp2=[[0]*MAX for _ in range(MAX)]
            for j in range(nums[i]+1):
                c1=j
                c2=nums[i]-j
                for k in range(nums[i-1]+1):
                    z1=k
                    z2=nums[i-1]-k
                    if c1<=z1 and c2>=z2:
                        # if i==1 and dp[z1][z2]:print((c1,c2),(z1,z2))
                        dp2[c1][c2]+=dp[z1][z2]
                        dp2[c1][c2]%=M
            dp=dp2
            # print(dp)
            
        ret=0
        for i in range(MAX):
            for j in range(MAX):
                ret+=dp[i][j]
                ret%=M
        return ret
